QuestData.Title: Grandma Wahl
QuestData.Description: It's not going to be easy to get Grandma Wahl to come with us. You must do whatever you can to convince her, though.$B$BYou'll find her at the Wahl Cottage. Please, $n. Do not lose your patience with her. Her mind is old and she's not entirely lucid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Grandma Wahl at the Wahl Cottage.
QuestData.RewardText: A visitor! Are you staying for tea, sweetheart?
